Plot: Three childhood friends set aside their personal issues and reunite for a girls' weekend on a remote island off the coast of Maine. One wrong move turns their weekend getaway into a deadly fight for survival.
Title: Black Rock
Actors: Katie Aselton, Lake Bell, Kate Bosworth, Will Bouvier
tomatoConsensus: It springs from smarter ideas than your average chase thriller, but ultimately, Black Rock falls back on disappointingly familiar ingredients.
